 Minimum spanning tree (MST) solver.

Detailed Description

Constrained bottleneck spanning tree bound implemenation.

Implemenation of the Constrained bottleneck spanning tree (CBST) bound used as a lower bound for the symmetric constrained bottleneck TSP objective value.

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file cbst.c.

Minimum spanning tree (MST) solver.

Parameters:
problem [in] problem data
info [in] problem info data
tree [out] MST tree (tree[i] gives precessor for node i)
max_cost [out] the largest cost in the tree
length [out] the length of all edges in the tree

arrow_heap *  heap,

)

Solves a (slightly modified!) minimum spanning tree problem.

Parameters:
problem [in] problem structure
C [in] largest cost in problem
exclude_cost [in] excludes costs less than this value except...
cur_tree [in] includes any edge costs found in this tree
tree [out] the resulting minimum spanning tree
max_cost [out] the largest cost in the resulting tree
length [out] the total length of the resulting tree
heap [out] a temporary heap structure
in_heap [out] a temporary integer array
d [out] a temporary integer array
